flavor_text: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.
Its body is encased in a sturdy shell. Its head rotates 180 degrees eliminating blind spots.
Possessing a sturdy build it takes pride in its strength taking down foes without using toxins.
It attacks people and Pokemon that cross the desert. This has only furthered its bad reputation.
